price: 这确是一种教训。谁愿意〔觉悟〕，谁可以选择一条通达他的养主的道路。
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkiratun faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan
